snippet.title: EXO Rally Championship - Game Reveal Trailer | PC Gaming Show 2023
snippet.description:
EXO Rally Championship puts you behind the wheel in the most dangerous off-road racing event in the galaxy. First revealed at the PC Gaming Show 2023, you'll speed across untamed planets through meteor strikes, volcanic eruptions, and try to control your buggy's jumps using thrusters. Damage to your racer can include overheating, wheel failures, and even toxic gas leaks. Read more on PC Gamer: https://www.pcgamer.com/exo-rally-championship-game-reveal-pcgs-2023

We’ve been covering PC gaming for more than 20 years, and continue that legacy today with worldwide print editions and around-the-clock news, features, esports coverage, hardware testing and game reviews on PCGamer.com, as well as major yearly events including the PC Gaming Show at E3.
